name: A Dragon, here?
description:
A man of humble work returns home to find a dragon is attacking his town!
Something is amiss however, they never go near humans-and why is there a weapon embedded in them?

The project is currently postponed as I do not have access to MZ, the game was made to test what the new game maker was like and my trial is over.
I would say "tell me what you think" but chances are I won't be able to use your criticism.

If you want to know what things I wish to work on, I attached my notes for that too.
Also the name is temporary, I don't have one for this.

The game is only available for Windows, sorry every other type of user.
